message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the negotiations at $2,300,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of this product and its potential for your business.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price you've suggested. I would like to propose an offer of $1,200,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, $1,200,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind.  To find a middle ground, I propose a price of $2,000,000. This offer reflects the significant value the product will bring to your operations.

Thank you for your proposal, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must respectfully decline the $2,000,000 offer. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,400,000. I hope this figure is more in line with your expectations and within my budget.
